text: The Doom Generation is a 1995 comedy-thriller movie. It is about teenagers becoming involved in a ménage à trois. Parker Posey plays Brandi. Margaret Cho also stars in the movie. This movie got mixed reviews from critics. Roger Ebert gave the movie a "zero star" rating. title: The Doom Generation
